dialogue.introduction: Fourth ship of the Nagara-class Light Cruisers, 'Yura'. Pleased to make your acquaintance!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Yura, the fourth ship of the Nagara-type Light Cruisers. I was the first out of all of us to be equipped with seaplanes. I've served as the flagship of torpedo and submarine squadrons. I'm not so good with Dauntless and B17 planes.
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral, do you really like my single barrel guns so much?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, how was my recon? As a light cruiser, I wanted to try doing it onceâ€¦
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Nagara-class Light Cruiser, Yura, heading out.
dialogue.equipment1: That's right, my firepower will become stronger, right?
dialogue.equipment2: Is my catapult... in the way?
dialogue.supply: Oh yeah, I've strengthen my firepower. Nice work!
dialogue.ship_construction: They say a new ship has been completed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Seems like the fleet has returned. I wonder if they achieved any results?
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Now, I guess I shall show off a little.
dialogue.mvp: Yura is the best? Really? Hurray!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: It will take more than this to sink me...
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Not yet... I won't sink from just this!
dialogue.sunk: I guess this is better... than being scuttled...
dialogue.new_year_2015: Admiral-san, Happy New Year. Please look after me this year too. Alright?
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Admiral, do you really like chocolate that much? Then, I'll give you some too....'kay?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Today is an important day to Yura too. Admiral-san, let us do our best from now on too ok?
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Admiral. You can feel the summer when the rainy season ends. Right? Yura would like... a new swimsuit too.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Admiral, it's summer right, right? Ah... Yuudachi-chan, your swimsuit is cute. Yura too, next year for sure...
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn.. huh. For some reason, whenever Autumn comes, I start to feel a little lonesome..
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, this food tastes good too. Say ahh~. It is fun, isn't it?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Admiral. It is Setsubun.....You want me to throw these beans? Admiral. Do you like doing these things that much?
